QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT CAST('1' + RIGHT(medical_facility_id, LEN(medical_facility_id) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS provider_id, medical_facility_id AS provider_source_value, Medium_classification_of_department AS specialty_source_value, CAST('1' + RIGHT(medical_facility_id, LEN(medical_facility_id) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS care_site_id FROM {sc}.Medical_facility
